Package com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.operator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NestedOperator
    Common interface for the nested Indatabase operators.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNestedOperator
    In-database NestedOperator that has exactly one output port and zero, one or more input port.
    AbstractNestedOperator.DbColumnSubsetSelector  
    AbstractNestedOperator.NestedPrecondition  
    AggregateOperator
    Allows the user to group rows based on the specified group keys and potentially aggregate remaining columns using aggregate functions.
    DistinctOperator
    Removes redundant rows from the input Example Set.
    FilterOperator
    Filter the rows of the input Example Set according to the specified condition.
    GenerateAttributes
    This operator allows the user to generate new columns or override existing columns.
    JoinOperator
    This operator joins two input Example Sets.
    Multiply  
    Nest
    The Nest is the meta-operator that selects the database connection and executes the SQL statements defined by its subprocess.
    Nest.DialectAndMetaDataKey  
    Nest.ExpressionEditorCache
    This cache is needed because the ExpressionPropertyDialog initialization may take a long time when the database type has many functions defined.
    Nest.ExpressionEditorCacheMap  
    NestPortPairExtender
    Handles the output ports of the Nest meta-operator.
    RenameOperator
    This operator allows the user to rename one or more columns.
    RetrieveOperator
    Reads a source table or view from the database.
    SampleOperator
    This operator limits the rows of the input Example Set, and potentially adds a row offset as well.
    SelectOperator  
    SortOperator
    This operator sorts the rows into ascending or descending direction based on the specified attributes.
    StoreOperator
    This operator is for writing data to the database, without downloading it to RapidMiner.
    UnionOperator
    This operator combines two Example Sets.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Nest.CouldNotRetrieveConnectionInformation  
    NestPortPairExtender.RuntimeOperatorExceptionWrapper
    Required to be able to throw OperatorException in methods where it is not possible to throw directly.
